original: hi i'm ellie thanks for coming in today
traduit: Salut, je suis Ellie merci d'être venue aujourd'hui.

original: and please feel free to tell me anything your answers are totally confidential

i'm doing fine just a little tired

not knowing how you can help him

being born again myself i don't know how to explain it it just very

traduit: Aucun que je veux vraiment mentionner je devine <rire>

heavy breathing <laughter> i mean i walk sometimes when i get a lil' frustrated whatever i'll just go take a walk

original: you know or um just try not to think about it

how old were you when you joined the military

are you happy you did that

original: um just made me a little bit more responsible
traduit: Ça m'a rendu un peu plus responsable.

original: what did you do after the military
i worked in the medical field for about five years
traduit: J'ai travaillé dans le domaine médical pendant environ cinq ans.

original: but um it wasn't for me i wanted to do something lil' bit different i didn't wanna do patient care i wanted to work with people but not necessarily as a patient care
traduit: Mais ce n'était pas pour moi que je voulais faire quelque chose d'un peu différent que je ne voulais pas faire de soins aux patients que je voulais travailler avec les gens, mais pas nécessairement comme soins aux patients.

original: i started going to school and then i met my husband i stopped going to school

mm yeah probably i don't i never really thought about it
